name: 林顯易
objective: 本課程以論文研討方式學習 "機器學習" 理論之基本概念與應用及各種演算法。課程內容包含概念式學習、決策樹、圖型理論、神經網路、貝氏網路、案例式學習及支持向量機等方法。經由這門課，學生能對現代機器學習技術及其應用有基本的了解。
schedule:
Week1: None
Week2: introduction
Week3: Probability 
Week4: Probablity distribution
Week5: Bayesian decision theory
Week6: Bayesian estimator
week7: Linear models for regression
week8: Linear models for classification
week9: K-means
week10: Mid-term
week11: Expectation maximization
week12: Gaussian mixture model
Week13: Principle component analysis
Week14: Sampling method
Week15: Particle filter
Week16: Hidden Markov Model I
Week17: Hidden Markov Model II
Week18: Reinforcement learning
materials:
Ethem Alpaydin, Introduction to Machine Learning
Christopher Bishop, Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning
